title: Iran Says US Will Bear "Full Responsibility" For Israeli Retaliation
content: Iran on Monday warned the United States would bear "full responsibility" in case of a retaliatory attack by Israel on the Islamic Republic, after US President Joe Biden indicated he was aware of Israeli plans to do so.
summary: Iran on Monday warned the United States would bear "full responsibility" in case of a retaliatory attack by Israel on the Islamic Republic, after US President Joe Biden indicated he was aware of Israeli plans to do so.

title: Blinken Heads To Middle East As Israel Intensifies Strikes In Lebanon
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken left for the Middle East Monday on a new push for an elusive Gaza ceasefire two weeks before US elections, seeing a new opportunity from Israel's killing of Hamas's leader.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken left for the Middle East Monday on a new push for an elusive Gaza ceasefire two weeks before US elections, seeing a new opportunity from Israel's killing of Hamas's leader.

title: Lebanon Says Child Among 4 Killed As Israel Strikes Near Beirut Hospital
content: Lebanon said four people including a child were killed Monday in Israeli air strikes near the country's biggest public hospital close to south Beirut, with state media reporting over a dozen raids.
summary: Lebanon said four people including a child were killed Monday in Israeli air strikes near the country's biggest public hospital close to south Beirut, with state media reporting over a dozen raids.

title: North Korea Sending Troops To Ukraine Would Be "Dangerous" Move: US
content: The United States on Monday said it would be a dangerous development for North Korea to send troops to support Russia in Ukraine, as Seoul has asserted.
summary: The United States on Monday said it would be a dangerous development for North Korea to send troops to support Russia in Ukraine, as Seoul has asserted.

title: No New Chief, Hamas To Be Led By Ruling Committee: Report
content: Two Hamas sources said the Palestinian militant group was moving towards appointing a Doha-based ruling committee rather than a single successor to its chief Yahya Sinwar, who was killed by Israeli troops last week.
summary: Two Hamas sources said the Palestinian militant group was moving towards appointing a Doha-based ruling committee rather than a single successor to its chief Yahya Sinwar, who was killed by Israeli troops last week.

title: Israel Strikes Hezbollah Bunker Containing "Millions" In Cash, Gold
content: The Israeli army on Monday said it hit a Hezbollah bunker holding tens of millions of dollars worth of cash and gold during strikes aimed at the group's financial network.
summary: The Israeli army on Monday said it hit a Hezbollah bunker holding tens of millions of dollars worth of cash and gold during strikes aimed at the group's financial network.

title: US To Limit Some Trade Transactions To Block Data Access By Russia, China
content: The US Justice Department on Monday proposed new rules to protect federal government data or Americans' bulk personal data from getting into the hands of countries like China, Iran and Russia by placing new limits on certain business transactions.
summary: The US Justice Department on Monday proposed new rules to protect federal government data or Americans' bulk personal data from getting into the hands of countries like China, Iran and Russia by placing new limits on certain business transactions.

title: Helicopter Crash In Houston Kills 4, Including Child, Destroys Radio Tower
content: A helicopter crash has killed four passengers, including a child, in the southern US city of Houston, authorities said, with the accident also destroying a radio transmission tower.
summary: A helicopter crash has killed four passengers, including a child, in the southern US city of Houston, authorities said, with the accident also destroying a radio transmission tower.

title: Why Switch To Electric Vehicles 'Makes Sense'? Charge Zone CEO Explains
content: Kartikey Hariyani, the founder and CEO of Electric vehicle (EV) charging network Charge Zone, while speaking at NDTV World Summit 2024, explained why switching to EV makes Sense.
summary: Kartikey Hariyani, the founder and CEO of Electric vehicle (EV) charging network Charge Zone, while speaking at NDTV World Summit 2024, explained why switching to EV makes Sense.

title: Donald Trump Sued For Defamation Over False Comment In Presidential Debate
content: The "Central Park Five," five men who were falsely convicted of rape in a notorious 1989 New York case, launched a defamation lawsuit Monday against former US president Donald Trump.
summary: The "Central Park Five," five men who were falsely convicted of rape in a notorious 1989 New York case, launched a defamation lawsuit Monday against former US president Donald Trump.

title: William Dalrymple On Why It Is A "Surprise That India Dominated Asia For 1,000 Years"
content: Archeology and solid scholarship show that India lay at the heart of ancient world, argued historian William Dalrymple, underscoring that the myth of the Silk road has made India seem more peripheral than it actually was.
summary: Archeology and solid scholarship show that India lay at the heart of ancient world, argued historian William Dalrymple, underscoring that the myth of the Silk road has made India seem more peripheral than it actually was.

title: Internet Reacts To Israel's Claim Of Yahya Sinwar's Wife's Rs 26 Lakh Bag
content: In the clip, Sinwar's wife is seen holding a bag, which Israel claimed to be worth $32,000 (around Rs 26.90 lakh).
summary: In the clip, Sinwar's wife is seen holding a bag, which Israel claimed to be worth $32,000 (around Rs 26.90 lakh).

title: Important Dates In US Presidential Election 2024
content: Republican former President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris, a Democrat, will face each other in the November 5 US presidential election.
summary: Republican former President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris, a Democrat, will face each other in the November 5 US presidential election.

title: Everything You Need To Know About The US Presidential Candidates
content: Republican former President Donald Trump will face Vice President Kamala Harris in the November 5 US presidential election after Democratic President Joe Biden ended his reelection bid.
summary: Republican former President Donald Trump will face Vice President Kamala Harris in the November 5 US presidential election after Democratic President Joe Biden ended his reelection bid.

title: Time For Global System To Change: What India's Former UN Ambassador Siad
content: Speaking about India's need to be treated as equals, Syed Akbaruddin said that, "This aspiration for being treated equally in a changing world is just an extension of our independence movement."
summary: Speaking about India's need to be treated as equals, Syed Akbaruddin said that, "This aspiration for being treated equally in a changing world is just an extension of our independence movement."

title: Germany's 3 Year Old "Mini Picasso" Gains Global Art Fame
content: Three-year-old Laurent Schwarz may still be wearing nappies but his paintings have earned him social media fame and the nickname of Germany's "mini-Picasso".
summary: Three-year-old Laurent Schwarz may still be wearing nappies but his paintings have earned him social media fame and the nickname of Germany's "mini-Picasso".

title: 2 Killed After Israeli Strike on "Civilian Car" In Damascus: Syria
content: Syria's defence ministry said two civilians were killed in an Israeli strike on a vehicle on Monday afternoon in the Mazzeh district of Damascus, home to embassies and security headquarters.
summary: Syria's defence ministry said two civilians were killed in an Israeli strike on a vehicle on Monday afternoon in the Mazzeh district of Damascus, home to embassies and security headquarters.

title: "Right And Duty To Retaliate": Israeli Envoy To India On Iran's Attack
content: Israel has a right and duty to retaliate after Iran fired at least 180 missiles at it on October 1, the country's Ambassador to India, Reuven Azar, has said.
summary: Israel has a right and duty to retaliate after Iran fired at least 180 missiles at it on October 1, the country's Ambassador to India, Reuven Azar, has said.

title: "Truly Historic": Egypt Certified Malaria-Free By WHO After 100-Year Effort
content: In the 1940s, malaria cases in Egypt surged to over three million due to population displacement during World War II.
summary: In the 1940s, malaria cases in Egypt surged to over three million due to population displacement during World War II.

title: Israel Airport Reopens After Brief Halt Over "Suspicious Object"
content: Israel's airport authority on Monday resumed operations at the country's main airport, Ben Gurion, after briefly closing its airspace.
summary: Israel's airport authority on Monday resumed operations at the country's main airport, Ben Gurion, after briefly closing its airspace.
